meanings.definition: A unit of length equal to one hundredth of a meter.
meanings.sent1: She measured the small box and found it to be one centimeter wide.
meanings.sent2: The ruler showed that the pencil was three centimeters long.
meanings.sent3: The tiny ant proudly declared, 'I can lift a centimeter-sized pebble!'
meanings.sent4: Her attention to detail was so precise, she could spot a centimeter difference in length.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the importance of understanding the size of a centimeter.

meanings.definition: A metric unit of length equal to 0.01 meter.
meanings.sent1: The fabric store sold ribbons by the centimeter for precise measurements.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter needed to cut the board to exactly twenty centimeters.
meanings.sent3: The chef joked, 'I need a centimeter-sized knife to make these tiny cuts!'
meanings.sent4: The distance between them was just a centimeter, but it felt like miles apart.
meanings.sent5: The scientist used a centimeter grid to map out the area of study.
